notes.title: Welcome to The GOAT-Maker Note Taker!
notes.text: You can't be the GOAT with out good notes...

notes.title: How it works
notes.text: This note taking app allows you to add and delete notes. Add notes by clicking the pencil icon to make a new note, then click the save icon when you're done.

notes.title: Delete Notes
notes.text: Clicking the trash bin next to the note you want to delete.
